info.title: Handwrytten API
info.description: This is an API documentation for a Handwrytten Client.

get.summary: Check whether a user exists in the db.
Get a user's data. The data is retrieved from the session automatically.

post.description: Register new user using email address and password. Sends activation email to user email address. User status is not_active until email is confirmed by clicking the link in the email.

dicount_code.description: Managed in admin area. Used to add credits / bonus credits to the user, and attach user to one of the existing groups.

silent_add.description: if the value is true, then the registration notification will not be sent

silent.description: if the value is true, then the registration notification will not be sent

enum: Password is too short. Minimum 4 characters.
Sorry, the discount code you are trying to use is invalid!
We are sorry, this discount code has already been used the maximum number of times.
Your account is not activated. Check your email.

post.summary: Log in as a user via a user's token

enum: This account has already been activated.
The URL address is incorrect. Maybe this account has already been activated.

post.summary: Send an email to reset a user's password.

enum: Reset request has been send on your email.
The user has been registered without a password.

get.summary: Get a user's hash to confirm reset password.

enum: The reset session is expired. Try the reset process again.

post.summary: Send a user's hash to confirm reset password.

enum: The url is invalid. Please, check the url or repeat the reset process.

post.summary: Sign up in Handwryten App for integrations

check_cass_before_submit.description:
check the recipient's address before submitting, applies to order with delivery confirmation

**If the value is 0, the address will be checked after the purchase, if the address is wrong, the amount will be returned to the credit balance.**

items.description: dictionary of order objects, order id is used as a key

cardId.description: card id is required for checking message length

message.example: Return Address City cannot be blank
Proin risus 1

description.example: Sleek and classy this letterpress card by OrangeBeautiful features a pressed red-brown bird on a branch and a simple Birthday Wishes message.  Sure to send a message of sophistication it is blank inside with a matching red-brown envelope.

I Love You Dad...But We Don't Have to Talk About It.  No one needs to know how you feel about your dad other than him.  Send him this card to let you know you care...no need to dig deeper.  Bank inside.  Write as little or as much as you wish.  By Emily McDowell. Matching craft envelope.

Sleek and classy this letterpress card by OrangeBeautiful features a pressed red-brown bird on a branch and a simple Birthday Wishes message.  Sure to send a message of sophistication it is blank inside with a matching red-brown envelope.

post.description: Upload custom image for future use with custom cards.
Checks image parameters so that they fit the card format

warning.example: This image may appear blurry as it is less than the recommended resolution.

error.example: This image is less than recommended resolution. Please upload another image.

enum: The file is not an image

post.description: Create custom card for future use for message composition.

card_id.description:
Identifier of the card on the basis of which the custom card is created
`Required if dimension_id is not present`

dimension_id.description:
Identifier of the card_dimension on the basis of which the custom card is created (see all customizable card dimensions - `GET /design/dimensions`)
`Required if card_id is not present`

is_update.description:
When set to `true`, creates a new card version while preserving the original card for order history.
When set to `false`, the card is used as a template to create a new independent card.
Default: `false`

cover_id.description: Image identifier for cover. Only images of the type "cover" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

preset_cover_id.description: ID of preset image. Only images of the type "front" or "mixed" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the image request - `GET /design/presetImages`)

main_type.description: `Only the folded card has a main customised side`

main_text.description: Text for the main that will be used if the main_logo_id is not specified

main_font_id.description: Font identifier for main text. A list of fonts for the customizer can be obtained using list_fonts_for_customizer request (GET /fonts/listForCustomizer)

main_logo_id.description: Image identifier for main. Only images of the type "logo" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

header_text.description: Text for the header that will be used if the logo_id is not specified

header_font_id.description: Font identifier for header text. A list of fonts for the customizer can be obtained using list_fonts_for_customizer request (GET /fonts/listForCustomizer)

header_logo_id.description: Image identifier for header. Only images of the type "logo" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

footer_text.description: Text for the footer that will be used if the footer_logo_id is not specified

footer_font_id.description: Font identifier for footer text. A list of fonts for the customizer can be obtained using list_fonts_for_customizer request (GET /fonts/listForCustomizer)

footer_logo_id.description: Image identifier for footer. Only images of the type "logo" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

back_cover_id.description: Image identifier for back cover. Only images of the type "cover" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

preset_back_cover_id.description: ID of preset image. Only images of the type "back" or "mixed" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the image request - `GET /design/presetImages`)

back_logo_id.description: Image identifier for back side. Only images of the type "logo" are permissible to be specified in this field (see the "type" parameter in the list_images request - `GET /cards/listCustomUserImages`)

back_text.description: Text for the back that will be used if the back_logo_id is not specified

back_font_id.description: Font identifier for back side text. A list of fonts for the customizer can be obtained using list_fonts_for_customizer request (`GET /fonts/listForCustomizer`)

back_font_color.description: Color for text in back side

qr_code_id.description: ID of QR code. A list of QR codes can be obtained using request (`GET /qrCode/`)

qr_code_size_percent.description: Can use for header in for folded card

qr_code_frame_id.description: ID of Frame. A list of frames can be obtained using request (`GET /qrCode/frames`)

enum: Icon with such id not found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the QR code which needs to be delete

massage.example: Qr code with id {id} has been deleted.

to_address.description:
Formatted recipient address combining street address, 
optional apartment/unit, city, state, ZIP code, and country (for international deliveries only)
Empty components are omitted.
to_address.example: 123 Main Street, Apt 2B, New York NY 10001

total_unique_scans.description: total unique scans of QR code

total_pending_scans.description: total QR codes waiting to be scanned

post.description: Calculate Taxes for basket orders. Use without any parameters for basket orders. *(Experimental)* Can be used to calculate taxes for any order, use with card_id, address_id, denomination_id, insert_id.

card_id.description: the id of the card you want to send

address_id.description: the id of the recipient's address, required if card_id is present

denomination_id.description: Optional.  Use if sending a gift card. Only if card_id is present

insert_id.description: the insert id for the order. Only if card_id is present

parameters.description: page number, numeration starts with 1, 50 items per page. if not set 250 items are returned.

login.description: email address; required if uidKey not present

card_id.description: the id of the card you want to send

message.description: the full message body.  Use '\n' for new lines

Dear Frank,
Thank you so much for your interest in our services.
Yours,
Joe

font_label.description: the colloquial name of the font, such as 'Fancy Jenna' or 'Casual David'

credit_card_id.description: the credit card id to charge for the order.  Currently this is required, even for invoiced accounts, it just won't be charged.

insert_id.description: the insert id for the order

check the recipient's address before submitting, applies to order with delivery confirmation

**If the value is 0, the address will be checked after the purchase, if the address is wrong, the amount will be returned to the credit balance.**

post.description:
Calculate targets

**if you use search by:**

`address` * `address` - required

* `city` [state; city] - required

* `radius` - required

* `latitude` - required

* `longitude` - required


`If you don't use latitude and longitude you can set just 1. We use them for a second search if nothing was found at the address`
--- `zip` * `zip` - required
--- `City and State` * `city` - required
--- `Circle` * `latitude` - required

* `longitude` - required

* `radius` - required


--- `Polygon` * `polygon` - required

type.description:
Type of outbound processing:
 * `residential` - Residential
 * `business` - Business

ownRent-d.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the ownRent-d=1-2`

Sort order: * `1` - Home Owner * `2` - Renter

resLen-d.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the resLen-d=1-3-4-5-8`

Length of Residency: * `1` - 0-6 Months * `2` - 7-12 Months * `3` - 1-2 Years * `4` - 3-5 Years * `5` - 6-10 Years * `6` - 11-15 Years * `7` - 16-20 Years * `8` - 20+ Years

hAge.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the hAge-d=1-3-4-5`

Household Age Code: * `1` - 18-24 Years Old * `2` - 25-34 Years Old * `3` - 35-44 Years Old * `4` - 45-54 Years Old * `5` - 55-64 Years Old * `6` - 65-74 Years Old * `7` - 75+ Years Old

people.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the people-d=4-5`

Total number of people in Household: * `1` - 1 Person * `2` - 2 Persons * `3` - 3 Persons * `4` - 4 Persons * `5` - 5 Persons * `6` - 6 Persons * `7` - 7 Persons * `8` - 8 Persons * `9` - 9+ Persons

kids.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the kids=4-7-8-5`

Number of Children in Household: * `1` - 1 Child * `2` - 2 Children * `3` - 3 Children * `4` - 4 Children * `5` - 5 Children * `6` - 6 Chidlren * `7` - 7 Children * `8` - 8 Children * `9` - 9+ Children

marital.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the marital=1-2`

Marital Status: * `1` - Unknown * `2` - Household contains at least 1 married person * `3` - Household contains at least 1 single person * `4` - Household contains both married & single persons

staff.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the staff=2-6-8`

Various sizes of staff as selection/filter: * `1` - 1 - 4 * `2` - 5 - 9 * `3` - 10 - 19 * `4` - 20 - 49 * `5` - 50 - 99 * `6` - 100 - 249 * `7` - 250 - 499 * `8` - 500 - 999 * `9` - 1,000 - 4,999 * `10` - 5,000 - 9,999 * `11` - 10,000 +

one.description:
One contact per business:
  * `0` - returns all contacts
  * `1` - returns one contact

sic.description:
`Otherwise specify the SICs (2 to 6 digits), use - dash to specify multiple SIC codes, i.e. sic-d=17-9999-729924`

Various SIC codes as selection/filter

Uses `GET /outbound/industries` to get a list of sic codes

check_quantity_inserts.description: Indicates whether the insert card should be checked for availability in the stock

`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the ownRent-d=1-2`

Sort order: * `1` - Home Owner * `2` - Renter

resLen-d.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the resLen-d=1-3-4-5-8`

Length of Residency: * `1` - 0-6 Months * `2` - 7-12 Months * `3` - 1-2 Years * `4` - 3-5 Years * `5` - 6-10 Years * `6` - 11-15 Years * `7` - 16-20 Years * `8` - 20+ Years

hAge.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the hAge-d=1-3-4-5`

Household Age Code: * `1` - 18-24 Years Old * `2` - 25-34 Years Old * `3` - 35-44 Years Old * `4` - 45-54 Years Old * `5` - 55-64 Years Old * `6` - 65-74 Years Old * `7` - 75+ Years Old

people.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the people-d=4-5`

Total number of people in Household: * `1` - 1 Person * `2` - 2 Persons * `3` - 3 Persons * `4` - 4 Persons * `5` - 5 Persons * `6` - 6 Persons * `7` - 7 Persons * `8` - 8 Persons * `9` - 9+ Persons

kids.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the kids=4-7-8-5`

Number of Children in Household: * `1` - 1 Child * `2` - 2 Children * `3` - 3 Children * `4` - 4 Children * `5` - 5 Children * `6` - 6 Chidlren * `7` - 7 Children * `8` - 8 Children * `9` - 9+ Children

marital.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the marital=1-2`

Marital Status: * `1` - Unknown * `2` - Household contains at least 1 married person * `3` - Household contains at least 1 single person * `4` - Household contains both married & single persons

staff.description:
`If you want to send multiple values; use the dash '-' to indicate a multiple values, for example, the staff=2-6-8`

Various sizes of staff as selection/filter: * `1` - 1 - 4 * `2` - 5 - 9 * `3` - 10 - 19 * `4` - 20 - 49 * `5` - 50 - 99 * `6` - 100 - 249 * `7` - 250 - 499 * `8` - 500 - 999 * `9` - 1,000 - 4,999 * `10` - 5,000 - 9,999 * `11` - 10,000 +

one.description:
One contact per business:
  * `0` - returns all contacts
  * `1` - returns one contact

sic.description:
`Otherwise specify the SICs (2 to 6 digits), use - dash to specify multiple SIC codes, i.e. sic-d=17-9999-729924`

Various SIC codes as selection/filter

Uses `GET /outbound/industries` to get a list of sic codes
